Oh jeez.
Hey. Hey!

translation.en: - Your leg? - I'm fine. Don't worry about me. It's nothing. I can barely feel it.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ 大して痛みも感じない

translation.en: How'd you know?
Found out they were made of gas.
So I took a chance.
Uh, good call.
Hey. So you took him out? The big guy?
translation.ja: デカブツを倒したのか？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. I slapped him around a bit,
translation.ja: 少し小突き回してやってから

translation.en: and then sliced his head off. Just like…
translation.ja: 少し小突き回してやってから 首を切り落とした

translation.en: So Sam saved you too?
Yeah, 100 percent.
Right.
Is that a pen in your leg?
Yeah.
Oh my God, dude. We need to take it out, like, right now.
What? No?
You could get ink poisoning. It's fatal.
Ink poisoning isn't a thing.
translation.ja: インクの毒で死ぬぞ ウソだろ

translation.en: Oh, dude. It's really a thing. Sorry.
translation.ja: 残念だけど本当のことだ

translation.en: - Just let me-- - Whoa! Wait! What if it's in an artery? Huh?
I could bleed to death.
There's a small chance of that. But there's hardly any major arteries in your legs.
translation.ja: 脚に大きな動脈はないから 大丈夫だ

translation.en: That's not true.
Okay, trust me! I have a medical degree, okay?
translation.ja: 医学の学位を持ってる

translation.en: You studied for three months online, Prince. You don't know shit!
translation.ja: ３か月の オンラインコースだろ

translation.en: Okay, that's just semantics.
translation.ja: それは ただの導入コース

translation.en: - I think… Just let-- - Can you stop?
translation.ja: それは ただの導入コース 触るな

translation.en: - Please. Just-- - Just be brave!
Here you go.
- Ah… - Now, can we please get out of here? Okay?
translation.ja: グズグズしてないで ここから出よう

translation.en: Yeah. Of course.
You can put your-- Okay.
What did she do to you?
I don't know. I mean, I just blacked out.
All I remember is I was cleaning outside of her office--
Whoa! Okay, Portia! Guys, wait!
Take it easy.
Is she okay?
translation.ja: 平気か？ 息を整えさせて

translation.en: I just need to catch my breath.
Breathe in through your nose and out through your mouth.
translation.ja: 鼻から吸って口から吐いて

translation.en: Wow. All this time I thought it was breathe out, then in.
translation.ja: 吐いてから吸うんだと 思ってたよ

translation.en: - What? - Oh, shit.
What a night.
I'm still trying to process everything. You know?
Tell me about it.
I'm gonna need years of therapy after this.
translation.ja: セラピーを受けなきゃ

translation.en: I mean, those were real aliens, you know? We didn't imagine that.
translation.ja: 宇宙人なんて 予想もしてなかった

translation.en: Hey, man. Um…
- Don't move. - What?
No! Don't move.
What is it?
It's probably nothing.
Prince! Dude, what is it?
Oh, shit.
Okay. I can fix this!
Wait, I'm going to be a paramedic. I can fix this.
I can do this.
- Prince. Give me the leg. - No.
translation.ja: プリンス それを置け

translation.en: - Give me the leg. Let go! - No! I can't let go!
translation.ja: プリンス それを置け 嫌だ　ジュニアに必要だ

translation.en: - No! He needs it. - Let go!
translation.ja: 嫌だ　ジュニアに必要だ

translation.en: Legs are important! Okay?
He doesn't need his legs because he's dead!
translation.ja: 脚は必要ない　もう死んでる

translation.en: Gone! Okay?
I'm sorry, but there's nothing you can do for him now!
translation.ja: もう できることはないんだ

translation.en: It doesn't matter, okay? All I need is a first- aid kit,
translation.ja: 救急箱さえあれば助けられる

translation.en: a shitload of bandages.
I can do this. I can do this.
Bandages? Dude, what're you talking about?
Are you crying?
No. No, not at all! I'm…
translation.ja: いいや 泣いてなんか…

translation.en: Whoa! I… I think I'm allergic to the aliens.
translation.ja: きっと宇宙人アレルギーだ

translation.en: You had another one of those stupid visions?
No, I didn't have one of those stupid visions, okay? Shut up.
translation.ja: 妄想じゃない　黙ってろ

translation.en: - Can you walk? - Yeah, I can walk.
Yeah, I got you.
Thanks.
- You good? - Yeah.
You know what sucks? We just saved everyone, and no one's gonna know.
translation.ja: みんなの命を救ったのに 誰も知らない

translation.en: That's okay. We'll know.
Oh, please. Don't act like you don't care. You're just trying to impress your girlfriend.
translation.ja: 彼女の前だからって かっこつけるなよ

translation.en: No, that's not it.
I'm not-- And she's not my girlfriend.
Are you?
You can be such an idiot sometimes, Junior.
I love you too.
Uh, I mean, I like you.
You like me too, so… We like each other.
translation.ja: お互いに好き同士だから…

translation.en: I love you.
I think my luck's changing!
What the fuck just happened?
Melusi.
He must've put paint in the Zulcanoid.
Overheated in the car.
What were you saying about luck changing?
Sam? What're you doing?
Sam?
Often the solutions to our problems are a lot closer than we think.
translation.ja: 時に解決策は 思ったよりも近くにある

translation.en: Sometimes they're right in front of us.
translation.ja: しばしば すぐ目の前に

translation.en: Oh my goodness! It works.
Turns out the real value of Zulcanoid is what it can do for damaged skin.
translation.ja: ズルカノイドの真価は 皮膚を治す力だった

translation.en: And that changed everything.
translation.ja: その事実が すべてを変えた

translation.en: Dude, I still can't believe that this is our place.
translation.ja: これが俺たちの新居か

translation.en: I mean, look at this view!
It's ridiculous.
It beats the shit out of my car, that's for sure.
You know I've never had a roommate before?
It's gonna be a new journey for us, man.
You don't meditate in the mornings, like… naked?
translation.ja: 毎朝 裸で 瞑想(めいそう)とかしないよな？

translation.en: Anything like that, right?
I mean, I don't, but if that's something you want to try?
translation.ja: やらないけど試したい？

translation.en: No!
That's not what I meant.
Sorry. I just misread.
Never mind. Let's just pretend…
What did you even say?
- What? - Um…
So I do most of my things naked. Are you boys okay with that?
translation.ja: 家の中で裸でいてもいい？

translation.en: 100% fine with that. Yeah.
Beers in the fridge.
Thank you.
- Don't do that. - Oh my God. She winked at me.
translation.ja: おい 僕にウインクを

translation.en: - No, she didn't. - Dude.
I am a medical professional. The human body means nothing to me.
translation.ja: 僕は医療従事者だから 裸には何も感じない

translation.en: That's not true.
I took an oath.
I don't believe you.
- I did. Yeah. - Prince!
translation.ja: 本当だ プリンス 真面目にやめろよ

translation.en: That's… That's not funny. Wait. Don't do that.
translation.ja: プリンス 真面目にやめろよ

translation.en: AMI didn't just get a new lease on life,
they got a new leader.
Someone who we could all get behind.
translation.ja: 誰もが支持できる人物

translation.en: And he made sure that everyone got what they deserved.
translation.ja: 新しいボスは 皆を正当に扱った 新しいボスは 皆を正当に扱った 〝最高責任者 サム･マセコ〞

translation.en: They say you stole over 50 million. Is it true?
translation.ja: 5000万以上を盗んだって 本当なのか？

translation.en: That's a lie. I didn't steal anything.
Ha! Whatever you say, Chief.
Welcome to your new home.
Hey. You want to pat my dog?
You're lucky. Fingers here makes a very special pudding.
translation.ja: フィンガーズは 特別なデザートを作る

translation.en: It's a secret recipe. I'm busy making some right now.
translation.ja: 秘密のレシピだ 今 作ってるところだよ

translation.en: Oh my God.
Does anyone want to tell me what this creepy place is?
translation.ja: この不気味な場所は何だい？

translation.en: It's our old refinery. We used to process Zulcanoid here.
translation.ja: 昔のズルカノイド精製所だ

translation.en: Oh, how fascinating.
I was hoping to go on a work tour on a Saturday.
This isn't a work tour, okay?
As the new head of security, I've been checking out all our sites.
translation.ja: 俺は新しい警備主任に なったろ

translation.en: And last night, I found something unbelievable. And I mean unbelievable!
translation.ja: それで施設を点検してたら すごいものを見つけた

translation.en: Why didn't you just take a video of this unbelievable thing and send it to me?
translation.ja: 動画を撮って 送ってくれたらよかった

translation.en: No. This is something that you need to see for yourselves. Okay?
translation.ja: 自分の目で見なきゃダメだ

translation.en: - You guys ready? - For what?
translation.ja: いいか？ がっかりする準備？

translation.en: To be disappointed?
Ah! Probably how Portia feels.
Just shut up! Come on.
Tell me that isn't the dopest shit you've ever seen!
translation.ja: こんなすげえもの 見たことないだろ

translation.en: Oh my God.
Now we know how they got here. And this isn't even the best part.
translation.ja: 連中は これに 乗ってきたんだ

translation.en: What do you mean?
Wait till you see what's inside.
translation.ja: 中は もっとすごい

translation.en: What's inside?
What's inside? What's inside?
Oh, shit.
